embed.title: Here are your current automod configurations.

about.title: Becca Lyria the Discord Bot
about.description: Becca Lyria is a Discord bot built for community management and moderation. She includes various tools to help moderate your server, as well as fun commands to drive engagement and interaction among your members. All of her commands use the new slash command interface, which helps your members use the features in a streamlined and clear way.

art.description: This portrait of me was done by [{{artist}}]({{url}})

contact.content: Here are the options for getting in touch with us:

donate.title: Sponsor my development!
donate.description: Did you know I accept donations? These funds help me learn new spells, improve my current abilities, and allow me to serve you better.
donate.footer: Join our Discord to get perks when you become a monthly sponsor!

feedback.success: Thanks! That feedback has been sent to our community! Be sure to join our [support server](https://chat.nhcarrigan.com) to see and participate in the discussion.

help.title: How to Interact with Becca
help.description: Hello there! I have many spells I can cast. To see the spells, type `/` and select my section from the pop-up menu.

support.title: Support Server
support.description: If you need some extra guidance, join my support server where my minions will be glad to serve you.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: As an alternative, you are welcome to view my instruction manual to see what I can do.

source.title: Source Code
source.description: Should you be feeling extra ambitious, you can also dive into my spell book and look at my abilities yourself.

bug.title: Bug Report
bug.description: Have I failed you in some way? You can report an issue, or let us know in the support server.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: As part of my services, I collect and use some specific Discord related information. This information includes, but may not be limited to, your user name, nickname, this server's name, and your Discord ID. [View my full policy](https://docs.beccalyria.com/#/privacy-policy?utm_source=discord&utm_medium=privacy-command)

invite.title: Do you require my assistance?
invite.description: I suppose I could provide my services to your guild. Click this [invite link](http://invite.beccalyria.com) and I will come serve you. You should also join our [support server](https://chat.nhcarrigan.com).

ping.title: Pong!
ping.description: Experiencing slow response times? [Join our support server](https://chat.nhcarrigan.com) for assistance.

privacy.title: I'll keep your secrets safe!
privacy.description:
To maintain my functionality, I need to collect quite a bit of data. Mostly, this data is user/server IDs, names, and avatars.

I will never store your message content in my database, but it may be logged in this server if the admins have enabled it.

If you want a full breakdown of everything I collect, [view my privacy policy](https://docs.beccalyria.com/#/privacy-policy?utm_source=discord&utm_medium=privacy-command).

profile.title: Becca Lyria
profile.description: If you want to read about my adventures, check my [profile site](https://www.beccalyria.com?utm_source=discord&utm_medium=profile-command). I would rather not have to recount them all here.

stats.invalid: That appears to be an invalid stat. Not sure how that happened.

translators.title: Thanks to Our Wonderful Translators
translators.none: No translators have contributed to the project yet.
translators.join: [Join our support server to get started.](https://chat.nhcarrigan.com)

updates.title: Update Information
updates.description: Becca's updates are deployed every Sunday around 8AM Pacific Time. This is important information to know, as these deployments clear the cache. This results in any outstanding cache-reliant features, such as polls, trivia games, or scheduled posts, to be lost. Please plan your interactions around this schedule.

changelog.title: Change Log
changelog.description: View Becca's entire change log [in her documentation](https://docs.beccalyria.com/#/changelog?utm_source=discord&utm_medium=changelog-command).

uptime.title: Adventure Duration
uptime.description: This is how long I have been on my adventure.

embed.description: I will send your message with the following settings. Please note that I am not perfect, and if I am offline when your event is scheduled to run, it will be discarded.

about.description: Our new currency system allows you to collect BeccaCoin, a virtual currency, and exchange these coins for rewards. These coins can be collected on a daily and weekly basis. Note that these rewards require you to [join our support server](https://chat.nhcarrigan.com).

modify.title: Right to Modify
modify.description: We reserve the right to add, remove, or modify rewards at any time, without prior notice to the users.

cash.title: No Cash Value
cash.description: BeccaCoin is a virtual currency with *no cash value*, except for implied value available through the reward exchange.

bots.title: No Bots
bots.description: Using automation, scripting, self-bots, or other methods to take advantage of the currency system are violations of Discord Terms of Service and we will deny any rewards obtained this way.

refuse.title: Right to Refuse
refuse.description: The development team reserves the right to refuse any claimed reward without compensation to the user.

claim.price: This reward costs {{price}} BeccaCoint. You only have {{total}}.
claim.invalid: This somehow appears to be an invalid reward. Please check with the developer team.
claim.monarch: You will take the `Monarch` role from whomever has it in our support server, and you will keep the role until someone else takes it from you.
claim.monarch-colour: You can select a new hex value for the colour of the `Monarch` role in our support server.
claim.wealthy: You will be given the `Wealthy` role in our support server. You will keep this role.
claim.wealthy-colour: You can select a new hex value for the colour of the `Wealthy` role in our support server. This change will affect everyone who has the role!
claim.button: Join our server to redeem your rewards!

daily.cooldown: You have already claimed your daily. Come back in: {{time}}
daily.title: Daily Reward!
daily.description: You've earned {{earned}} BeccaCoin! You now have {{total}} BeccaCoin!
daily.reminder: {{- user}}, you can claim your daily BeccaCoin now!

guess.insufficient: You cannot wager more coin than you have!

slots.nowager: You must wager at least one BeccaCoin.
slots.insufficient: You cannot wager more coin than you have!
slots.cooldown: You cannot play slots that often! Come back in: {{time}}

twentyone.nowager: You must wager at least one BeccaCoin.
twentyone.insufficient: You cannot wager more coin than you have!
twentyone.cooldown: You cannot play 21 that often! Come back in: {{time}}
twentyone.title: Twenty One!
twentyone.description: Get your score higher than Becca without going over 21! Press `hit` to increase your score, and `stand` to stop playing and let Becca finish her turns.
twentyone.expired: This game has expired after ten minutes.

no.title: Uh oh!
no.description: Weekly rewards are only available to members of our support server! You can [join with this link](https://chat.nhcarrigan.com) and come hang out with us!

weekly.cooldown: You have already claimed your weekly! Come back in {{time}}
weekly.title: Weekly Reward!
weekly.description: You've earned {{earned}} BeccaCoin! You now have {{total}} BeccaCoin!
weekly.reminder: {{- user}}, you can claim your weekly BeccaCoin now!
